title: How i can ask riot for 3 rp?
body:
I just need help, I need 3 RP to buy a key, but i don't know how to ask Riot for it, help me pls
.... I too have one question,  would they delete loot in season 8?

replies.body: We may be able to help.  :)  Draw me a picture of a poro enjoying the autumn, and maybe we can work something out!
